public class HyperExponentialStream
extends RandomStream
Returns a number from a hyperexpontial distribution with the given mean and standard deviation.

HyperExponentialStream(double, double)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.
HyperExponentialStream(double, double, int)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.
HyperExponentialStream(double, double, int, long, long)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.

getNumber()
Return a value from the stream.

HyperExponentialStream 
  public HyperExponentialStream(double m,
                                double sd)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.

HyperExponentialStream 
  public HyperExponentialStream(double m,
                                double sd,
                                int StreamSelect)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'. Skip the first 'StreamSelect' values.

HyperExponentialStream 
  public HyperExponentialStream(double m,
                                double sd,
                                int StreamSelect,
                                long MGSeed,
                                long LCGSeed)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'. Skip the first 'StreamSelect' values. Pass seeds 'MGSeed' and 'LCGSeed' to the base class.

getNumber

Return a value from the stream.
